summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account transactions for Gratitude America, Ltd. for the month of May 2017. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and account balances, highlighting significant transactions such as a $150,000 check and a $50,000 outgoing transfer.

persons.name: Stewart Oldheld
persons.context: Stewart Oldheld is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Beginning Balance
events.description: The account had a beginning balance of $133,644.36.

events.title: Ending Balance
events.description: The account had an ending balance of $176,089.56 after various transactions.

events.title: Large Check Payment
events.description: A check for $150,000 was paid from the account.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: An outgoing transfer of $50,000 was made to Bank of America.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account for Gratitude America, Ltd. had a beginning balance of $133,644.36 and an ending balance of $176,089.56 as of May 31, 2017.
A significant transaction included a check payment of $150,000 on May 12, 2017.
An outgoing transfer of $50,000 was made to Bank of America on May 11, 2017.
The document includes contact information for Stewart Oldheld, a bank representative.
The statement outlines various service charges and interest payments for the account.
